t: Ascribe*pn to the Lord,*s you heavenly beings, ascribe*ld to the Lord*s glory and strength.
Ascribe*ln to the Lord*s the glory due his name; worship*ld the Lord*s in the splendor of his holiness.
The*pn voice of the Lord*s is over the waters; the*ld God of glory thunders, the*ld Lord*s thunders over the mighty waters.
The*ln voice of the Lord*s is powerful; the*ld voice of the Lord*s is majestic.
The*ln voice of the Lord*s breaks the cedars; the*ld Lord*s breaks in pieces the cedars of Lebanon.
He*ln makes Lebanon leap like a calf, Sirion*ld like a young wild ox.
The*ln voice of the Lord*s strikes with*ld flashes of lightning.
The*ln voice of the Lord*s shakes the desert; the*ld Lord*s shakes the Desert of Kadesh.
The*ln voice of the Lord*s twists the oaks and*ld strips the forests bare. And*ln in his temple all cry, “Glory!”
The*pn Lord*s sits enthroned over the flood; the*ld Lord*s is enthroned as King forever.
The*ln Lord*s gives strength to his people; the*ld Lord*s blesses his people with peace.
